channel.title: Remove Because of inconsiderate jerk
channel.description: you know if you have nothing nice to say don't say it at all! and its not my fault im used to winging stuff! for gods sake most things i learned how to code in rs2 private servers, was from [size=26pt]TRIAL AND ERROR!!![/size] so if you don't wanna answer a simple question as to (how to fix the tools.jar problem) then don't even offer anything.

item.title: Remove Because of inconsiderate jerk
item.dc:creator: @The_Djinn The Djinn
item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:9, topic:218491”][quote author=imthenull link=topic=287100.msg4301538#msg4301538 date=1369083517]

[quote author=The Djinn link=topic=287100.msg4301514#msg4301514 date=1369081477]
To fix the tools.jar issue you can go to your Jre6/lib/ and there should be a tools.jar located in there. Now copy over your tools.jar to your Jdk6/lib/. Once you’re finished doing that, compile and you should be set to go with it not failing this time.

Have fun,

The Djinn.
[/quote]This is 2013, you better not be using JDK 6.
[/quote]Yeah it still has some compatibility issues. You should be using JDK5.[/quote]

I don’t use JDK 6. I figured OP was probably using it.

Read full topic

item.title: Remove Because of inconsiderate jerk
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:9, topic:218491”][quote author=imthenull link=topic=287100.msg4301538#msg4301538 date=1369083517]

[quote author=The Djinn link=topic=287100.msg4301514#msg4301514 date=1369081477]
To fix the tools.jar issue you can go to your Jre6/lib/ and there should be a tools.jar located in there. Now copy over your tools.jar to your Jdk6/lib/. Once you’re finished doing that, compile and you should be set to go with it not failing this time.

Have fun,

The Djinn.
[/quote]This is 2013, you better not be using JDK 6.
[/quote]Yeah it still has some compatibility issues. You should be using JDK5.[/quote]well if you want to talk about compatibility issues, you’re better off with JDK Beta v0.1.I mean look @ RSC, it’s literally compatible with every machine that supports java.

Read full topic

frigger908:

you know if you have nothing nice to say don’t say it at all! and its not my fault im used to winging stuff! for gods sake most things i learned how to code in rs2 private servers, was from [size=26pt]TRIAL AND ERROR!!![/size] so if you don’t wanna answer a simple question as to (how to fix the tools.jar problem) then don’t even offer anything.

Aww, would you like a tissue? For god sakes it’s not hard, just search for it in the lib folder of your JRE.

item.title: Remove Because of inconsiderate jerk
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

[quote=“Vrunk, post:3, topic:218491”][quote author=frigger908 link=topic=287100.msg2323093#msg2323093 date=1215578372]
(i have experience in rs2 private servers but that ain’t doing me squat. :mad:)
[/quote]

I have experience in following tutorials to the letter, learning absolutely nothing in the process, and being an annoyance to all of those I ask for help from.

That about what you meant to say?[/quote]yes thats exactly what he ment! you are like a mind reader.
